t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: ODORZOUT All Surface Odor Removal Granules, 30 oz. (850g) Bottle
s: The only way to actually clean all the granules was to replace the carpet with a brand new one. Instead of using this product on carpets, I suggest using Bissell wet vacuums, either full size or the auto mini-vacuum with the Pet urine cleaner rather than using Odorzout.
